trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Tempatriq is in a mindmuddle.
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TODO_00<tab>Collect a piece of poxyleaf waterweed.
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TODO_01<tab>Collect a piece of fancyleaf waterweed.
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TODO_02<tab>Collect a piece of gaudyleaf waterweed.
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TODO_03<tab>Return the waterweed samples to Tempatriq.
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_000<tab>Oh, what is Tempatriq to do? It is so near, and yet so far...

TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_001<tab>Earlend Tempatriq, lowlander! She told potsworn friend about the beautiful waterweed of Marsh Ligaka, and potsworn friend says she wants to study it closeeyes.

TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_002<tab>But waterweed grows at the bottom of the water, and Tempatriq can't fishwalk. Can't ask potsworn to collect it herself, either─it would go against the potpact. You wouldn't happen to be a talented fishwalker, would you?
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_003<tab>...You're a talented fish<var 1A 02 /var>breather<var 1A 01 /var>, too!? Then you are the perfect lowlander for the job!

TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_004<tab>Need to gather three types of waterweed from Marsh Ligaka: poxyleaf is pink and poisonlooking, fancyleaf is lacy and lovely, and gaudyleaf is super shimmershiny! Please find them for Tempatriq!

TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_005<tab>Many kinds of waterweed grow in Marsh Ligaka. Tempatriq only needs you to collect three of the most distinctive: poxyleaf type, fancyleaf type, and gaudyleaf type.
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_006<tab>Pfff... pfffkohhh... Did you find the waterweed?
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_007<tab>Wonderdeeds! They're even more beautiful up close than they are in the water!
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_008<tab>Tempatriq will show them to her potsworn friend right away! They're sure to give her plenty of mindfruit.

TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_009<tab>She is an expert at reproducing nature─not only in prettylooks, but in funnytraits, too. This waterweed has a very special funnytrait: it changes color depending on the warmth of the water in which it grows, its exposure to light, or even over the longyears.
TEXT_KINGZC105_05075_TEMPATRIQ_000_010<tab>If she can craft danglejewels that do the same, they will surely sell for a potload of jinglyshine!
